about_the_game:
Set in a bizarre yet wonderful world, Liam_99 is a story-driven, adventure and exploration game. You’ll play as - and sometimes alongside - Liam, a skeleton who lost every memories of his past life... but still knows he's the main character of a video game!

Helping Liam remember who he was will require you to overcome four major adventures, each one very different from the others - in terms of environment and ambiance as well as gameplay-wise. Brace yourself for various challenges such as obstacle races or puzzles, exalted with a touch of 4th wall-breaking and absurd jokes!

In addition to these four adventures, Liam_99 shall let you roam freely a world full of wonders and secrets. Discover famous works of art (anew), plunder treasure chests and collect strange keys, venture deep underground… or have a moment to take in the view and appreciate Liam’s jokes. Whatever works best for you!

Liam_99 aims to offer a refreshing, carefully designed experience.



The game shall be fully voice-acted in French, as well as in English - if the crowdfunding campaign is enough of a success.


Spoiler alert: Liam's past is hardly a bed of roses.


The breaking of the 4th wall lies at the core of Liam_99's design and narration.


If you think that Death is restful, you may change your mind after playing the game.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES



- An open afterworld to explore

- Many cutscenes to skip (please don't)

- A day/night cycle and weather system

short_description: Liam_99 tells the story of a little skeleton, amnesic but aware of being the central character in a video game, off on a journey of self-discovery through a vast afterworld. Embark with your favorite protagonist (soon enough) on a humorous yet poetic adventure!
